Reviews.Title: Very pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Nina Renae
Reviews.Content: Perfect little point and shoot camera.. I am an amateur and this camera is very easy to use and operate. Was definitely less on amazon than in the store especially with the inclusion of the cleaning kit, and travel case, tripod, usb card . Etc. Great deal. Only problem was cleaning solution spilled a bit in the separate packaging it was in. Other than that no issues and have used on several occasions now. Camera was brand new and needed to be charged upon receiving.

ProductInfo.Features:
Thinnest camera with a 12x Optical Zoom, Optical Image Stabilizer and 28mm Wide-Angle lens
Canon's HS SYSTEM with a 10.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor combined with Canon's DIGIC 5 Image Processor for exceptional low-light performance up to ISO 3200
Shoot beautiful 1080p Full HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button; zoom while shooting and play back videos on an HDTV via the HDMI output A 3.0-inch PureColor System LCD enables easy viewing
Improved Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 58 predefined shooting situations and the new Face ID function adjusts focus and exposure priority based on pre-registered faces
Improved Movie Digest records a short 720p HD video clip right before shooting a photo and then combines one day's worth of clips into one video
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 520 HS 10.1MP CMOS Digital Camera in Blue + 16GB Micro SDHC + Focus Multi Card Reader + Accessory Kit
